title: Attention Is All You Need
content: This research paper introduces the Transformer architecture based entirely on self-attention mechanisms, forming the foundation of modern NLP models.

title: Deep Learning Overview
content: This resource explains deep learning concepts including neural networks, representation learning, and applications in AI systems.

title: Machine Learning Crash Course by Google
content: A beginner-friendly course covering supervised learning, loss functions, gradient descent, and neural networks.

title: Hugging Face Transformers Documentation
content: Official documentation for using transformer-based models for NLP tasks such as text generation, summarization, and question answering.

title: Scikit-learn User Guide
content: A comprehensive guide to machine learning algorithms including classification, regression, clustering, and model evaluation.

title: AI & Machine Learning Notes (PDF)
content: This PDF provides structured notes on artificial intelligence and machine learning concepts, including supervised learning, neural networks, and real-world use cases.

title: MDN Web Development Guide
content: MDN documentation covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, web standards, browser compatibility, and frontend best practices.

title: JavaScript Guide
content: A detailed guide to JavaScript programming including event handling, asynchronous programming, and core language features.

title: React Official Documentation
content: Official React documentation for building component-based, scalable, and high-performance user interfaces.

title: Node.js Documentation
content: Node.js documentation explaining server-side JavaScript, REST APIs, and scalable backend development.

title: REST API Design Guidelines
content: Guidelines for designing RESTful APIs using HTTP methods, stateless architecture, and best practices.

title: Web Development Notes (PDF)
content: This PDF contains detailed notes on web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, frontend-backend concepts, and practical examples.

title: AWS Cloud Computing Overview
content: An overview of cloud computing concepts including scalability, elasticity, and AWS cloud services.

title: Microsoft Azure Documentation
content: Azure documentation covering virtual machines, databases, AI services, and DevOps tools.

title: Google Cloud Platform Overview
content: An introduction to Google Cloud services including computing, storage, networking, and machine learning.

title: Docker Documentation
content: Documentation on containerization using Docker to package and deploy applications consistently.

title: Kubernetes Basics
content: A beginner guide to Kubernetes for orchestrating containerized applications.

title: Cloud Computing Fundamentals (PDF)
content: This PDF explains cloud computing models, deployment strategies, AWS, Azure, and container orchestration concepts.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
content: An introduction to cybersecurity concepts such as access control, threat detection, and data protection.

title: OWASP Top 10
content: A list of the most critical web application security risks and vulnerabilities.

title: Network Security Basics
content: Explains network security principles including firewalls, intrusion detection, and encryption.

title: Encryption and Cryptography
content: Covers cryptographic techniques used to secure communication and protect data.

title: Zero Trust Security Model
content: Explains the zero-trust approach requiring continuous verification of users and systems.

title: Cybersecurity Notes (PDF)
content: This PDF provides structured notes on cybersecurity, including threats, encryption, network security, and best practices.

title: Introduction to Financial Technology
content: Explains fintech concepts such as digital payments, online banking, and financial automation.

title: Algorithmic Trading Basics
content: Introduces algorithmic trading strategies using automated rule-based systems.

title: Risk Management in Finance
content: Explains financial risk identification, assessment, and mitigation strategies.

title: Healthcare Data Analytics
content: Describes how data analytics improves healthcare outcomes and operational efficiency.

title: Electronic Health Records (EHR)
content: Explains electronic health records and their role in modern healthcare systems.

title: Finance & Healthcare Analytics Notes (PDF)
content: This PDF covers finance and healthcare analytics, risk management, healthcare data systems, and real-world applications.
